Methods

addEdge(idNodeStart, idNodeEnd, id, weightopt)

This method adds an edge in graph.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
idNodeStart any node's identifier which begins the edge.
idNodeEnd any node's identifier which terminates the edge.
id any edge's identifier (only string or number).
weight Number <optional>
 1 the edge's weight.

object any the object contained in node.
id any node's identifier (only string or number).
